Text: which feed is this? American or Canadian?
It appears to be a British feed; neither the NBC nor the Canadian CTV feed.  But the PQ is good and it's 1440x1080 H264 codec, so it's nice to have this quality available.
Update: it's the BBC Sport feed from DBS satellite
